title: Chicken fajitas with tomato salsa
description: Fajitas are a fun meal to cook for the family. Try topping with homemade salsa to make them extra delicious. This meal is low calorie and provides 418 kcal, 35g protein, 47.5g carbohydrate (of which 11g sugars), 9g fat (of which 3.5g saturates), 8g fibre and 1.2g salt per portion.
ingredients: large handful of fresh coriander leaves, chopped
1 red pepper, cored, deseeded and thinly sliced
1 yellow pepper, cored, deseeded and thinly sliced
450g/1lb chicken breasts, skinned and cut into thin strips
